title: Meaning Interpretation Training Based on Text Analysis through School Garden Education Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge and understanding of text analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Learners are mid-level domain experts with professional (medical/legal/technical) backgrounds studying in a smartphone-centered limited technology environment, with performance measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core semantic elements (morphemes, repetitive patterns) in the school garden educational project text.
Learners can write a report interpreting the purpose and expected outcomes of the educational project based on text analysis results.
Learners can evaluate the educational value of the school garden project and propose improvement strategies through collaborative activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
